content:
I'm happy to help you with your trip planning! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to access your personal financial information or check your credit card balance. I'm also not a financial institution, so I wouldn't be able to provide you with real-time information about your account.

To check your credit card balance, I recommend logging into your online banking or mobile banking app, or contacting your credit card issuer's customer service directly. They will be able to provide you with the most up-to-date information about your account and help you determine if you have sufficient funds to pay the outstanding balance for your hotel booking.

Additionally, you may also want to consider setting up a payment reminder or automating the payment through your online banking or credit card issuer's website to ensure that you don't miss the March 1st deadline.

I hope this helps, and I wish you a wonderful trip to Japan!
